dict.string: Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 to 11 seconds.
Cast a flash of confusion on a group of enemies in an area, causing them to stumble around disoriented for 9 - 18 seconds. Damage done to confused targets will break the effect.
Enchantress buffs herself and her allies, increasing Defense by 10%. Attackers are slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.
Place a shield on the Enchantress and her allies that reflects incoming projectiles for 5 seconds.
Summon an arcane explosion 15 yards around an enemy, dealing 200% weapon damage as arcane damage and knocking back all monsters caught within it.

Bathe an area of ground with pure arcane energy for 3 seconds. Enemies caught in the arcane pool take an extra 50% damage from all attacks for 3, are slowed by 75%, and take 50% weapon damage as arcane damage per second.
The Enchantress places a buff on her allies increasing attack speed by 10% for 10 seconds.

When the player is low on health, the Enchantress lobs a bulb of magical energy at the player that will hex all enemies within 15 yards into chickens for 4 seconds. Hexed enemies are unable to perform offensive actions.
Mistress of magic whose powerful illusions disable and confuse her foes.
Ranged attack that slows the target by 70% for 3 seconds.
Ranged attack which deals 50% weapon damage as poison damage over 3 seconds.
Blinds enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 9 - 11 seconds. Any hit will break the effect.
The Scoundrel vanishes in a cloud of smoke when injured, reappearing after 5 seconds. While vanished he will heal for 2030 Life.
The Scoundrel's ranged attacks fire 3 bolts at a time.

Powerful ranged attack dealing 250% weapon damage as arcane damage. The impact also causes an explosion 15 yards around the target, knocking back enemies caught in it, with a 50% chance to stun them for 5 seconds.
Increases Precision by 10% for the Scoundrel and his allies.
Whenever you or the Scoundrel strike a critical hit you both will go into hysterics, increasing Attack by 10% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Expert grifter who poisons, blinds, and skewers enemies from range.
Heals you or the Templar for 2030 Life.
Taunts enemies attacking you for 5 seconds when you are below 50% health.
Enemy units are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds when they hit the Templar. Does not stack with other slows.
Regenerates 50 Life per second for you and the Templar.
Charges a target, dealing 150% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 15 yards for 3 seconds.
Delivers a massive blow to an enemy for 200% weapon damage plus 120 - 162 physical damage.

When an ally of the Templar is low on health, the Templar will charge enemies near the ally, damaging enemies for 300% weapon damage and stunning them for 5 seconds. The Templar will also heal the wounded ally for 1218 - 1624 Life, and grant them 59 Life regeneration for 15 seconds.

Increase resource generation for all allies that the Templar is following. Mana: +13 per second. Arcane Power: +1 per second. Hatred: +1 per second. Discipline: +1 per second. Fury: +10% generated. Spirit: +10% generated.
Peerless holy warrior who challenges demons head-on in melee.
